bike.description: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted, integrated head tube, curved top and down tube, CNCD hollow box section BB, water bottle mount. Rear triangle: A-6 Quaternary phase alloy, custom butted w/ Four Bar linkage system 90mm travel, Cold forged dropout with CNCD disc mount and replaceable hanger, Sealed bearing pivots

Rock Shox Monarch 3.3 w/Motion Control and 3 position Switch Floodgate
NEW Avid Elixir CR, 185 F/160mm R Rotor
NEW Avid Elixir CR  w/Carbon lever
Ritchey Logic Zero Pro 1 1/8" Press Fit Integrated, 30mm spacers
Ritchey WCS Stream w/ Ca-NiTi rails
